About the property
Tired of staying in cramped rooms in local PGs in Chennai? Not anymore! Finding fully managed premium accommodations in the city won’t be a reason to worry because we ’ve got you saved. Equipped with BHK styled inventory for rent with double sharing rooms, the property is all-inclusive of an array of premium furnishings coupled with a wide range of services to make your stay hassle-free. Each apartment embodies DTH, high-speed unlimited WiFi and everything that will meet your needs. Having IT companies in its vicinity, it definitely makes up for an ideal stay for the techies.

About the property
Located in the main locality, Zolo wind-sphere is just a few steps away from the Bus stop. It is just 50 meters from the OMR main road. IT parks like AKDR Tower, ASV Sun Tech Park, Chennai One are just FIVE minutes away from this property. Also, IT Parks like Chennai ONEare just TEN minutes drive from here. column9:
About the property
Zolo Pinnacle Crest is a gents residential apartment in Sholinganallur Chennai. This fully furnished, apartment-structured accommodation is ideal for all men working or studying in the Sholinganallur area. This luxury apartment comes with double and triple sharing rooms with AC or non-AC. Important places near to this apartment are Navalur, Karapakkam, and Perumbakkam. One can stay within the 5-minute walking distance from well-known tech offices like Infosys, Tech Mahindra, and Accenture. Apart from the housekeeping and security facility, Zolo Pinnacle Crest also offers amenities such as washing machine, refrigerator, TV, etc. One can also cook food in their apartments with the appliances and cookware provided by Zolo. The residents can also avail the Club House services like Gym and Swimming Pool in the gated community apartment, apart from the recreational facilities like indoor and outdoor games.
